sentences.english: Then the factors which effected spacecrafts long-time adjoint flying were listed and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析影响航天器长期伴随飞行的各种因素。

sentences.english: But the cosmodrome is just a start for Russia's new space ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 但航天器发射场只是俄罗斯新的空间雄心的开始。

sentences.english: On the floor below these aircraft are three spacecraft command ships.
sentences.chinese: 在这几架飞机下面的地板上展出了三个航天器指令舱。

sentences.english: The aerodynamically smooth nose cone will protect the spacecraft during launch.
sentences.chinese: 在空气动力学平稳鼻锥将在发射航天器的保护。

sentences.english: Soviet cosmonauts had very little control over their spacecraft.
sentences.chinese: 苏联宇航员则不能控制他们的航天器。

sentences.english: The two space vehicles locked on to each other.
sentences.chinese: 那两只航天器衔接起来了。
航天器的预定溅落时间为上午。

sentences.english: Hypervelocity impact of meteoroid and space debris on spacecraft can lead to significant damage and catastpphic failure.
sentences.chinese: 微流星和空间碎片是现在任何使命航天器的公认威胁。

sentences.english: This is our first acquisition in-orbit spacecraft observations of the picture.
sentences.chinese: 这是我国获取的第一张观测在轨航天器的图片。

sentences.english: Vriable emittance thermal control device is one of the focus of the future spacecraft thermal control.
sentences.chinese: 可变发射率热控器件是未来航天器热控的焦点之一。

sentences.english: The elastic vibration of spacecraft with beam like appendages is studied as wave motion in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 将带梁式柔性附件航天器的附件振动作为波动研究。
航天器的预定溅落时间为上午5时30分。

sentences.english: A strong tether connected Leonov to the spacecraft.
sentences.chinese: 一个强大的系绳连接列昂诺夫的航天器。

sentences.english: Space-based TT&C Mode(SBTM) is necessary for TT&C of satellites.
sentences.chinese: 天基测控模式是航天器测控发展的必然趋势。

sentences.english: Space radiator is an important component in spacecraft thermal control subsystem.
sentences.chinese: 在航天器热控制中，空间辐射器是最主要的排热部件。

sentences.english: Anomalies and malfunctions of some spacecrafts induced by single event effects(SEEs)are surveyed.
sentences.chinese: 列举了若干航天器因单粒子效应而出现的异常或故障。
